dialog: What was the outcome of your day's endeavors, my friend?
I engaged in a game of wizard's poker with my colleagues from the Ministry of Magic.
Did fortune smile upon you this day?
Indeed, success was mine.
I seek to retrieve a portion of my savings stored within my wizarding account.
Might I request a glimpse of your wizarding ledger and the form for withdrawal, if you please?
Of course, here you are.
Let me just verify, you desire to withdraw the sum of one thousand wizarding galleons?
Precisely so.
May I inspect that magical camera, if you don't mind?
Certainly, this is a particularly fine piece of magical technology.
What is the cost for this device?
This particular model is valued at 1500 wizarding knuts.
It appears to be a fine specimen. I believe I shall purchase it.
Might I interest you in any additional items?
No, thank you, that shall be all.
I require a beverage to wash down my meal. Is there any juice available within the refrigerator?
What is this revolting concoction before me? It appears to have originated from the depths of a bog!
It is a potion of a green hue, touted to contain numerous vitamins and minerals.
One needn't sacrifice taste in the pursuit of a healthy diet, my friend.
